question: “Global Platform for Sustainable Cities” is an initiative by:
explanation: The ‘Global Platform for Sustainable Cities’, or GPSC, which is a part of an initiative funded by the Global Environment Facility (GEF) was launched recently at Singapore. It is expected to mobilize up to $1.5 billion over the next five years for urban sustainability programs in 11 developing countries. The project is coordinated by the World Bank and supported by multilateral development banks & UN organizations.
